summary: Adds the \"fortify alchemy\" effect to four ingredients.
descriptionHtml:
A requested mod by [url=\"http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4472935-redbeard007/\']Redbeard007[/url] to add ingredients with the Fortify Alchemy effect. I didn\'t want to do anything that would change any lists (and my attempts to make harvestable plants failed), so I edited four preexisting ingredients: 

[list][*]Skeever Tail has had its \"damage health\" effect changed to \"fortify alchemy\". (It had both \"damage health\" and \"ravage health\", which seemed redundant. I left the worse one.)
[*]Small Antlers has had its \"fortify restoration\" effect changed to \"fortify alchemy\". 
[*]Nirnroot and Crimson Nirnroot have had their \"damage stamina\" effect changed to \"fortify alchemy\".[/list]

[b]Edit:[/b] if you want your Nirnroot pristine, v 1.1 uses Eye of Sabre cat (replaces \"restore stamina\" and Giant Lichen (replaces \"restore magicka\") instead.

This is under \"Cheats\" because, well, there\'s probably a reason this didn\'t exist in the vanilla game. 

===Install===
NMM or extract file to your Data folder.

===Compatibility===
[list][*]Shouldn\'t have much of a problem with anything that doesn\'t change those four ingredients.
[*]If you are using a mod that makes alchemy take time (if there is one, I\'m not sure) you might have a problem due to the potion durations being, like most potions, about a minute. If anyone is using such a mod and can test that out I would appreciate it. [/list]

===Note===
The screenshot that shows the Nirnroots being used shows that the Fortify Alchemy effect lasts for 0 seconds. After taking that screenshot I fixed that so they actually have durations on their effects.
author: AnkhAscendant
